Asst. General Manager, Wild Horse Pass Development Authority
September 12, 2014, Thomas reported directly to Steven

I've had the privilege of knowing and working with Steve for the last twenty years. Recently, I worked with Steve in various web marketing and operational efforts. Steve has a great ability to listen, get to the heart of complex business issues, and propose solid, creative business solutions. Steve is a consummate professional who is driven to execute, add value, and deliver beyond expectations. His team leadership skills are clearly evident through his ability to harness a wide variety of creative, technical, operational, production and journalistic team members into a value producing cohesive effort. Without hesitancy, I would highly recommend Steve and his team for web marketing initiatives, video production, and internet content management technology.
